Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) fd_LFD_cockTower = self self:diffuse(.2,.2,.2,1) self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) end
%function(self) fd_LFD_cock = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) self:zoom(1) end
%function(self) fd_LFD_cockface = self self:diffuse(.5,.5,.5,1) self:diffuseramp() self:effectclock('bgm') self:effectperiod(2) self:effectcolor1(.6,.48,.48,1) self:effectcolor2(.8,.75,.75,1) end
%function(self) self:diffuse(.5,.5,.5,1) fd_LFD_cockMin = self self:shadowlength(2) self:spin() self:effectclock('bgm') self:effectmagnitude(0,0,60) --4320 end
%function(self) self:zoom(.85) self:diffuse(.5,.5,.5,1) fd_LFD_cockHr = self self:shadowlength(2) self:spin() self:effectclock('bgm') self:effectmagnitude(0,0,-43) end
%function(self) self:diffuse(.3,.25,.25,1) self:x(0) self:hidden(0) self:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT) fd_LFD_cogIn = self self:shadowlength(2) end
%function(self) fd_lfd_chain1 = self self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.925) self:diffuse(.25,.25,.25,.75) self:shadowlength(5) end
%function(self) fd_lfd_chain2 = self self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.85) self:diffuse(.25,.25,.25,.75) self:shadowlength(5) end
%function(self) fd_lfd_chain3 = self self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.1) self:diffuse(.25,.25,.25,.75) self:shadowlength(5) end
%function(self) fd_lfd_cog1 = self self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.2) self:y(0) self:diffuse(.25,.25,.25,.75) self:shadowlength(5) end
%function(self) fd_lfd_cog3 = self self:x(0) self:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.1) self:diffuse(.25,.25,.25,.75) self:shadowlength(5) end
%function(self) fd_lfd_cog4 = self self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH) self:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.9) self:diffuse(.25,.25,.25,.75) self:shadowlength(5) end
%function(self) fd_lfd_cog2 = self self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.8) self:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT) self:diffuse(.25,.25,.25,.75) self:shadowlength(5) end
